faq.answer: We offer multiple financing paths for Windsor Locks homeowners: solar loans (with terms from 5-25 years and competitive APRs), solar leases (no upfront cost, fixed monthly payments), and power purchase agreements (PPAs where you pay only for the electricity produced). We also have zero-down financing options. During consultation, we'll analyze which option provides the best financial outcome for your situation.

faq.question: How much can I save with solar in Windsor Locks, CT?

faq.question: What happens to my solar loan if I sell my Windsor Locks home?
faq.answer: If you own your solar system through a loan, you have several options when selling: pay off the remaining loan balance at closing, transfer the loan to the buyer (with lender approval), or factor the loan payoff into your sale price. Solar systems typically increase home value by more than the remaining loan balance. We discuss these scenarios during consultation to help you plan ahead.
